properties.address: Clifton Parish Church, North Yorkshire YO30 6BH

properties.title: Clifton Parish, York

properties.address: Haxby Memoral Hall, yo32 3ht yo32 3ht yo32 3ht
properties.description: We offer light snacks, meals or just a cuppa. To share with friends or meet new people. We offer games, jigsaws to borrow or play, reading library to borrow books. We have various agencies attend to help with various issues. Our Local Area Co-ordinator attends to support. We only ask for a donation of what the person can afford.
properties.title: Haxby Memorial Hall - Meet & Eat

properties.address: Methodist Church, York, North Yorkshire YO62 6DQ
properties.description: This space is open to all. Every Wednesday, 9 am-3 pm.
properties.title: Kirkbymoorside Methodist community Rooms

properties.address: 54 Wheatlands Grove, York, North Yorkshire YO26 5NH
properties.description: Lidgett Grove Community Café is open from 9:30 – 11:30 on Wednesdays, offering a warm space and café facilities. Everyone is welcome and the project has been running for several years, supporting people of all ages in the local community. The café serves hot drinks, cakes and a bacon buttie all at a small fee, but there’s no requirement to purchase and there’s always something to get involved with or someone to talk to.
properties.title: Lidgett Methodist Community Cafe

properties.description: We cater for all. A full cafe is open on Tuesday and Wednesday and the cafe space is available for people to work with laptops. We have disabled access and toilets. There is a car park with free parking to building users and a bike shelter.
properties.title: Living Word Church

properties.address: Central Methodist Church, St Saviourgate, York yo1 8nq
properties.title: Place of Welcome Central Methodist Church

properties.address: St Barnabas Church, Jubilee Terrace, York, North Yorkshire YO26 4YZ
properties.description: Accessible space open to everyone, Monday mornings (except Bank Holidays), with free drinks and cakes.
properties.title: St Barnabas, York Community Café

properties.address: St Denys Church, York, North Yorkshire YO1 9PU
properties.description: A Warm, Welcoming, Safe, Happy, Place Entry Fee is a Hug People helping Each Other. Sharing Tea and Chat, Nibbles and Giggles A Hot Meal, Arts and Crafts , Bring and Mend, Movie Afternoon
properties.title: St Denys Church Hall Family

properties.address: York Theatre Royal, St. Leonard's Place, York, North Yorkshire
properties.description: Our café is open from 10am - 4.30pm where you can purchase hot drinks, homemade pastries, and brownies, or hot food between 10am - 3pm.
properties.title: York Theatre Royal

properties.address: York Sports Club, Clifton Park, York, YO30 5RE
properties.description: Every Wednesday 10am until noon York Sports Club is a GOOD PLACE WARM PLACE.... Meet up with old friends & new ** FREE ** Tea, Coffee & Biscuits Come along for a chat, free wi-fi with ample free parking available. No purchase required​York Sports Club is the home of:York Cricket ClubYork Rugby Union Football ClubYork Squash ClubYork Tennis Club

properties.title: York Sports Club - Good Place Warm Place

properties.description: Fancy a cuppa? Fancy a chat? Or a place to just relax in the warm? Come and join us in our living room! Everyone is welcome and we can't wait to meet you!Free tea and coffee is available to all - as well as clothes and fresh fruit and veg to take home. Every Monday we restock our food stall and have tinned goods available as well. All completely free!Donations (of goods and money) are welcome.
properties.title: York Travellers Trust
